item.title: By: edja
item.dc:creator: edja
item.description: Just want to make sure, so if I keep holding at least 100TRX in my Atomic Wallet TRX address for 29 months forward, I will receive this airdrop 29 times, right?
item.content:encoded: Just want to make sure, so if I keep holding at least 100TRX in my Atomic Wallet TRX address for 29 months forward, I will receive this airdrop 29 times, right?

item.description: Being so new at this the article really helped but I still have so many questions it scares me. Ihave no idea what an airdrop is. what does tell U about my knowledge of the bitcoin world.

Being so new at this the article really helped but I still have so many questions it scares me.

item.title: By: Quesi Job
item.dc:creator: Quesi Job
item.description: Would love to receive some JST, but I need to get some TRX first. How long will it take for my account to be credited when I buy with my card?
item.content:encoded: Would love to receive some JST, but I need to get some TRX first. How long will it take for my account to be credited when I buy with my card?

item.title: By: CryptoP
item.dc:creator: CryptoP
item.description: I suppose the amount of JST reported here is the total amount to be distributed for the stipulated range of time for instance, from May 20 to June 20, amount is 217,800,000 JST? I also, think that it can be airdropped to AWC holders in determined ratio.
item.content:encoded:
I suppose the amount of JST reported here is the total amount to be distributed for the stipulated range of time for instance, from May 20 to June 20, amount is 217,800,000 JST?
I also, think that it can be airdropped to AWC holders in determined ratio.
